context: Polymerization was performed under stirring at 80°C for about 15h. The compositions of co-monomers are shown in Table 1 . The prepared polymer beads were collected, washed with distilled water and acetone, and then dried. The polymer beads were pre-swollen in methylene chloride and extracted with the same solvent in Soxhlet apparatus for 15h, then washed successively with pure solvent and solvent mixtures with gradually increasing solubility parameters, i.e., acetone, acetone/methanol, methanol, methanol/water, and finally distilled water. Afterwards, the beads were dried in air for 24h, and then in oven at 60°C. Polymer beads with diameters in the range of 0.3–1.0mm were selected for further studies.
